short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Always know the best Offers on eComm across your Credit Cards

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Did you buy anything online in the last week? If you are anything like me, the answer would be multiple times. 
Did you get a discount through your credit card? I know your answer is most probably a No. 
Now, imagine, what if every time, you visit your favourite online sites, you are automatically notified of the discount you can avail, through your card. Would you like that? 
Well, all you got to do, is to download this chrome extension and get smarter at shopping online, rightaway. 

We scan the web for the best offers at your favourite portals for the best deals. So that when you are on these portals, you dont miss out on the same.
Our list of offers also include the bank offers from the top banks and payment networks.
So start spending smartly while shopping online !

See you there!
